content: the court of appeal in catania issued a final ruling in a case involving elrond npl 2017 srl and the bankruptcy partners of tc di zm e c snc the court ordered the dissolution of a community property and assigned ownership of two real estate units to the respective parties they also determined a cash settlement and divided two garages however the court dismissed the application for division of two foreclosed apartments the court explained the legal principles and procedures involved in the case including the importance of division in individual insolvency proceedings they also addressed the issue of nullity in relation to the division of unauthorized buildings and concluded that such divisions are exempt from nullity penalties the court ruled in favor of the appellant and ordered the defendants to bear the costs of the proceedings the decision was made on january 16 2020 by the council chamber of the second chamber

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Catania sez. II, 21/01/2020, (ud. 16/01/2020, dep. 21/01/2020), n.187
